summary: This bill, the "Disengaging Entirely From the United Nations Debacle Act of 2025" (DEFUND Act of 2025), aims to terminate the United States' membership in the United Nations and all affiliated bodies. It mandates the President to withdraw the U.S. from the UN, close the U.S. Mission, and cease financial contributions. It also repeals existing legislation related to UN participation and agreements, prohibits U.S. participation in UN peacekeeping operations, and restricts UN presence on U.S. government property. Furthermore, it repeals U.S. involvement in the World Health Organization and UN conventions, and imposes restrictions on future U.S. reentry into the UN.
